subject: Fashion
title: Silk Road Trade Impact
description: A micro-lesson that makes Silk Road Trade Impact usable.

hook.text: Silk was so valuable that Roman senators paid its weight in gold.

buildup.text: The Silk Road moved textiles, spices, and ideas across 7,000 miles.

discovery.text: Trade routes spread Buddhism, Islam, and technology alongside fabrics.

twist.text: The route also carried the Black Death from Asia to Europe.

climax.text: No other trade network shaped civilization as deeply as the Silk Road.
